documents.document: So when exactly does America become great again?
@AnnaGConnell @FullersFerry you raise some excellent points about a ferry service on a busy weekend in Akl though. Game gotta be lifted.
It was so much easier being the PM of NZ when the only dispute with the POTUS was whether a 5 iron or 7 iron was the better club for yr shot
Remember when we used to think John Key was the biggest twonk in charge of the country. Lol.

@FrancesCook YES FRANCE COOK YOU *totes* SHOULD
When do the time-travellers from the future come back and sort this mess out? What if this mess *is* an improvement on an even worse mess?

Whoever is responsible for https://t.co/ueljduEg6d is awesome!
@psirides @KazemiAlex even if she just disbarred him for coiffure crimes...
Remember when we thought 2016 was a bad year? Lol.
@KazemiAlex @psirides For that despot to not get a full, state shebang at BuckPal would be the ultimate #slaykween move from Lizzie.
As a British Citizen I’ve signed this with pleasure... https://t.co/wslSl9KbNA
@shessassy @NZRedCross That link has a great list of resources!
I guess that makes me a snowflake.
I’ve been looking for a cause to put some money where my mouth is, so I’ve set up an A/P with the Wellington refugee reunification trust.
Any others? I’m going with the first one methinks...

Remember when you were in no doubt that the Wellington 7s were on in the city? Now you’d barely know anything was happening.
#TFFS Thank Fuck For Snowflakes. #MAGA Make A Giant Avalanche
@psirides IKR. The world has gone mad.
@psirides @incogellen that's a parody right? Surely??? I made $130,000 working 2 nights a week for two years at my dad's law firm. 🖕🏼

In the same vein as this tweet...
https://t.co/VbO17KHysj https://t.co/fApirPi2ow
@rebeccawatson such is his egomania, I wouldn't be surprised if he commissioned the 5th plinth of Mount Rushmore to be in his image.
@Ahhmandah @_snozzberry_ #alternativefacts
LOL, DJT has pictures of his inauguration crowd framed in the Whitehouse. He’s such a fucking manbaby.
He’s so inarticulate. I hate him.
DJT is a fucking twonk.
They are praying at the Pennsylvania meeting. So weird. I’m so glad NZ is secular and we don’t do that shit.
@Grab_One you need to follow to allow me to DM
@canibagthat this was sandwiched between some #alternativefacts in my timeline and I read it as being one. 😅
Now, more than ever, we need the mainstream media to keep asking questions and hunt the deep corners of this administration to find them.
Alternative facts. ALTERNATIVE. FACTS! That would be hilarious if it wasn't so fucking terrifying. #alternativefacts
This can't be real but it is pretty lolz. Although nothing will surprise me anymore. https://t.co/rcatIxg1mT
There's something amazing about the protests in the USA. It's awful that it's come to this but a sense of resistance is incredible.
@WelshGasDoc and visual hallucinations of seeing a million and a half people in a crowd of dozens.

We. Are. All. Fucking. Doomed. https://t.co/yImTPPWo3U
I've tried repeatedly to unsubscribe to @grab_one's emails & every morning they arrive in my inbox. How do I stop this unsolicited torture?
This speech is divisive and venomous #Inauguration
The tricks of photography to keep a tight zoom on the audience to make it look like there are people there is incredible. #Inauguration
We are all going to die. #Inauguration
Thank you so much but booooo. Not a lotto winner. Oh well, back to work for me on Monday. #nzsecretsanta
Now to check that lotto ticket. I could be a bajillionaire!! #nzsecretsanta
and the kind donation to NZ Young Farmers to help those afflicted by the quake. Very generous of you, and just what I wanted. #nzsecretsanta
So, after a mixup with my #nzsecretsanta, my one arrived today! A massive thanks for the lovely words in the card, the lotto ticket...
Just endured the yearly tradition of my car failing its warrant. #FML
How about that wind and that no sleep all night huh? #summerinwellington
@jk_rowling @ddale8 The US equivalent of Hansard are going to earn their crust trying to keep up with the inane word salad that spews forth
@EmmaMerrynz ba ha ha. That's excellent.
@rscottweekly 'I sewed it up with two big bites of 1.0 nylon' is totally meaningless.
Laymen talk of a wound as having x-number of stitches as if that's an actual legit measure.
Are we in the calm before the #WeatherBomb rn because there's barely a rustle of leaves out there?

@rscottweekly @ESA_HQ forfeit your membership.

I've spent the morning making some travel plans but will the world even exist in September? Times they be uncertain.
